entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Windy. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
